mapper.select: SELECT member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_address as memberAddress, member_phone as memberPhone, office_code as officeCode FROM customer WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_pw = #{memberPw}
SELECT office_code as officeCode, office_name as officeName, office_manager as officeManager FROM management WHERE office_code = #{officeCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bankaccount( account_no, member_id, account_name, account_office, account_manager ) values( #{accountNo}, #{memberId}, #{accountName}, #{accountOffice}, #{accountManager})
